definition: seat/base/stand/CL:個|个[ge4]/classifier for buildings, mountains and similar immovable objects

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Chopsticks and spoon can be put in special seat, or put on paper sets.
sentences.chinese: 筷子与汤匙可放在专用的座子上，或放在纸套中。

sentences.english: Retrotransponson is one of the major parts of rice transposon.
sentences.chinese: 逆转座子是水稻转座因子的一个主要组成部分。

sentences.english: Transposon is a very useful tool of gene function analysis.
sentences.chinese: 转座子是基因功能研究十分有用的工具。

sentences.english: You are always doing something marginal when the boss drops by your desk.
sentences.chinese: 你总是在做些无关紧要的事，当老板到你的座子旁时。

sentences.english: So we started doing transposon mutagenesis.
sentences.chinese: 于是我们开始做转座子的突变发生。

sentences.english: We ladies of Barchester will erect for it a fitting receptacle.
sentences.chinese: 我们巴彻斯特的妇女会给它竖立起一个合适的座子的。

sentences.english: And if they insert in the middle of the gene, they disrupt its function.
sentences.chinese: 如果转座子插入到基因之中，就会扰乱基因的功能。

sentences.english: Transposon tagging is a powerful molecular tool for isolating genes with unknown functions.
sentences.chinese: 转座子标签法是克隆未知基因的有效方法之一。

sentences.english: We ladies of Barchester will erect for it a fitting receptacle .
sentences.chinese: 我们巴彻斯特的妇女会给它竖立起一个合适的座子的。

sentences.english: Who has spilled water on the seat of the chair?
sentences.chinese: 这椅子的座子上面谁给撒上水了？

sentences.english: This is the first example of transposon tagging in rice.
sentences.chinese: 本文是水稻中第一个转座子标签的例子。

sentences.english: Transposons have been shown to have powerful impacts on genetic stability.
sentences.chinese: 转座子已被证明在遗传稳定性上具有强大的影响力。

definition: rickshaw seat (Beijing dialect)/patron (of teahouse, cinema)/passenger (in taxi, rickshaw etc)
pedal (in a car, on a piano etc)/treadle/footstool/footrest/footboard
